title: For Sale:  Armalite AR-50 - .50BMG
postcontent:
As the title says, Armalite AR-50.  One of the most accurate .50BMG rifles available.  It will shoot sub MOA in the right hands, which are not mine.  I got it in trade with a Bushnell 10X scope mounted (the one that comes on Barrett .50 "kits") which seems to hold up to the reverse recoil of the .50 just fine.  That said, a rifle of this caliber needs quality glass and I just don't feel like spending the money for a Nightforce or a Swarovski on a rifle that I barely shoot (I prefer to pack light).  If I shot match, it might be a different story, but since I don't, I'd rather have the cash and focus on my other precision rifles.  Note:  This is not the National Match edition, which has a tighter chamber and can have issues with military ammo (I hear).  Anyway, here is what you get:

- Rifle ($3,359)
- 15MOA scope base ($80)
- Bushnell 10X mildot ($200)
- Prince Bipod ($213)
- OD Green Pelican Case for the kit ($300)
- 10 rounds of Hornady A-MAX ($50)
Over $4,200 has been spent on this rifle.

I am open to trades: Savage 110B, Robinson XCR, PWS Diablo upper, SCAR, .300 Blackout SBR/Pistol upper, Aimpoint Micro, Aimpoint/Eotech 3X Multiplier, etc.  
As you can see, I'm only interested in quality products.  If you have something else you think I might like, let me know.  I am also looking to get a quality 60-80 gallon air compressor as well, so if you have one we can work it into the deal.

Obviously, I can pull the scope, as this is a "starter scope" for a rifle of this caliber.

I must say, this thing is insanely fun to shoot.  I have shot many .50BMG rifles, and the Armalite is by far the most enjoyable.

The RFB is not for sale, just for scale.

By responding to this post, you are stating you are of age, not a felon, and can legally own this weapon.

Let me know if you have any questions.  I will meet for serious inquiries only.  This thing is not easy to "grab and throw in the truck".

postcontent:
The SIG SAUER® Enhanced Adaptive Carbine Platform (ACP) allows any handgun with an accessory rail to be quickly modified into a personal defense weapon or carbine style firearm. Regardless of the brand, most pistols equipped with an accessory rail can be mounted to the ACP without the need for modification to the base gun.

ACP will accept most railed guns with barrels up to 5" in length.

This enhanced model includes the new SIG SAUER Mini Red Dot Sight, a quick detachable sling swivel and a Single Point Bungee Sling, Glock 23 40cal.

Fabricated from solid aircraft-grade aluminum, the ACP sports M1913 rails at the 3, 6 and 9 o’clock
positions with a full-length top rail at the 12 o’clock position. Compatible accessories such as lights, red
dot sights and lasers can be mounted for additional functionality.

The ACP brings Personal Defense Weapon (PDW) features to almost any handgun

Enhanced ACP value $499.00

postcontent:
For sale is a Glock model G22 .40 S&W that I have updated and extensively customized. All the internals have been replaced with new, latest model parts, including: a new striker and 6lb. striker spring, ejector, extractor, trigger bar with smooth trigger, drop safety plunger and spring, and a 6lb trigger spring. The gun comes with one G27 magazine and one G22 magazine.

Here is a list of the customizations:
1) Ghost Ultimate 3.5lb. connector (the best on the market, IMHO!)
2) TruGlo Tritium Bright/Night sights have been installed. (They are awesome all day long!)
3) The gripframe has been Duracoated maroon.
4) The slide has been Duracoated in HK Black.
5) The barrel has been matte hard chrome plated by Accurate Plating & Weaponry.
6) I’ve installed an extended slide release, Duracoated in HK Black.
7) A Pierce +1 extension, Duracoated in HK black, has been added to the G27 magazine. 
8) A universal ClipDraw, Duracoated in HK black, has been installed for right hand IWB carry.
9) The gripframe has been reduced to G27 size for ease of concealment.
10) The gripframe has also been stippled and lightly sanded prior to Duracoating to improve grip.
11) All lettering has been painted white.

This pistol looks AWESOME and is a pleasure to shoot! Building it was a fun project but it’s time to move on to something new. I don’t want this beauty to turn into just another safe queen. 

I’ve got more than $800 into this gun, but I'm asking substantially less. Reasonable offers only. No low-balls, please. Cash only. All original parts and a soft zippered case will be included.

Face-to-face buyers must be willing to sign a simple sales receipt (we’ll each get a copy) and show me their OH driver’s license or concealed handgun license to confirm age and OH residency. I’m willing to ship out of state, at your expense, to an FFL holder willing to receive shipment from a private individual. 

Thanks for looking!

title: For Sale:  Browning 1886 Winchester Rifle made 1986 45-70 in Box
postcontent:
This is a Browning made Winchester 1886 45-70 Rifle in 45-70 Gov't. The 1886 is known as the nicest design of any lever gun. These Brownings are know to be the nicest examples of the 1886. These were made in 1986 only, to celebrate the centennial of the design. There were only a couple thousand of these made. Of course this rifle was a John Browning design so it was only fitting that Browning released these. These are not like the newer Winchesters that have rebounding hammers (which I have found to sometimes cause light primer strikes) and tang safeties. These are just like the originals but with better metal technology and machining. 

This rifle is in mint condition and has the original box and manual. Feel free to ask questions. I can email more pictures if needed. Located in Tucson.

By completing this class you will then be eligible to apply for your Kansas Carry Conceal License through the Attorney General's office.

The class covers CCH law, Use of Force, Basic Marksmanship, Care and Maintenance, Weapon Selection, Holster Selection, Methods of Carry, Self Defense, and Interaction with Law Enforcement. 

There is a written exam along with a shooting test. You don't need to worry about either test as I give you everything you will need to pass them both during the 8 hour course. 

I have no minimums on my classes and will NOT cancel them because I don't have enough people for the class. One person is all it takes.

You can bring your own pistol for the shooting portion along with 50 rounds of ammunition. I recommend using a .22 however any caliber is accepted. If you don't have a pistol yet or would just like to borrow mine I have a .22 Ruger.

title: For Sale:  LaserLyte Laser Trainer Target
postcontent:
Brand new, everything in perfect working condition, can demonstrate at time of pick up. You can use any laser with this system.


The LaserLyte Laser Trainer Target records where a laser hits the target to save shooters time, money and ammunition. For use with LaserLyte's popular line of Laser Trainers including the original Laser Trainer, Laser Trainer Pro and Laser Trainer Cartridge, the Laser Trainer Target is ideal for novice or professional shooters and even instructors. It allows you to learn or teach shooting skills, such as unsighted fire, accuracy, grouping and trigger control. The Laser Trainer Target offers anyone the ability to practice shooting skills at almost any location, even a favorite recliner. Practice more often, become a more confident shooter and enjoy a lifetime of low-cost training with the LaserLyte Laser Trainer Target. The Laser Trainer Target gives the user delayed shooting feedback, just like the shooting range, so the shooter can concentrate on the next shot instead of the last shot. To use the Laser Trainer Target simply aim at the target and dry fire the weapon with any LaserLyte Laser Trainer. To display impact, fire the laser at the red display circle on the face of the Laser Trainer Target. When finished, simply dry fire the laser aimed at the red reset circle to begin again with a fresh target. 

Price is 100 or best offer I paid 140 plus shipping.
I also have the laser bullet, in 45ACP 60 or best offer comes with 30 extra batterys

Call anytime or text REDACTED

The PMR-30 is a light weight, full size pistol chambered for the flat-shooting .22Magnum cartridge (.22WMR). The PMR-30 operates on a unique hybrid blowback/locked-breech system. This operation system allows for the use of a wide variety of ammunition as it seamlessly adjusts between locked breach and blowback operation, depending on the pressure of the cartridge. It uses a double stack magazine of a new design that holds 30 rounds and fits completely in the grip of the pistol. The trigger is a crisp single action with an over-travel stop. The manual safety is a thumb activated ambidextrous safety lever (up for SAFE, down for FIRE). The slide locks back after the last shot and a manual slide lock lever is also provided. The light, crisp trigger pull and fiber optic sights make the PMR-30 ideal for target shooting and hunting small game.
TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
Calibers:	.22 Magnum	(.22WMR)
Weight unloaded:	13.6oz.	385.6g
Loaded Magazine:	6oz.	170.1g
Length:	7.9"	200.7mm
Height:	5.8"	147.3mm
Width:	1.3"	33.0mm
Barrel length:	4.3"	109.2mm
Sight radius:	6.9"	175.3mm
Energy (40gr):	138ft-lbs	187J
Capacity:	30 rounds
Trigger pull:	4-6 lbs	17.8-26.7N
Slide and barrel are 4140 steel, frame is 7075 aluminum. Grip, slide cover, trigger, mag release, and safety levers are glass reinforced Nylon (Zytel), much like other Kel-Tec Pistols. Magazine is Also Zytel and holds 30 rounds, with round count ports. Other features include: dual opposing extractors for reliability, heel magazine release to aid in magazine retention, dovetailed aluminum front sight, Picatinny accessory rail under the barrel, Urethane recoil buffer, captive coaxial recoil springs. PMR30 disassembles for cleaning by removal of a single pin.

title: For Sale:  Custom forged Zombie Apocalypse short sword
postcontent: This is a custom Rockfarm Knives creation, no power tools were used In forging the 5160 steel blade to shape.  The 13- 3/4" long curved edge is light, quick and slice's thru anything in it's way.  The 6" homemade micarta handle is made from strips of fabric  and epoxy that covers the tang.  The curled steel buttplate is a one piece design made from extending the tang.  The entire length of the back of the blade has been hand filed in vine and thorns pattern. The blade has a forced patina on the convex edge that contains the ancient Greek words for truth, honor and courage.  The ambidextrous sheath is made from curly redwood and leather with hemp cord wraps.  Wherever you go this blade is sure to get attention, it slices so well to brush n jugs that you may never wanna put it up!

Comes with one brand new 13-round Mec-Gar magazine (Mec-Gar makes the factory Beretta magazines). I only put a single box of ammo through this gun, but it didn't experience any malfunctions for me. Specifications and Features:

Company Background.

In 1998 Joe Roebuck recognized the increasing demand for a safe, simple to use, and affordable firearm due to political climate changes and most states enacting legislation to allow conceal and carry permits. Joe Roebuck has been in the manufacturing industry for 35 years, and chooses to use his talents as a Tool & Die Maker and Mechanical Design Engineer to design the CPX series of firearms. . September 2003, Joe Roebuck founded Skyy Industries, LLC now known as Sccy Industries, LLC to produce a conceal & carry firearm known as the CPX 9mm. The company's first offices and manufacturing facility was located in South Daytona, Florida and as of February 2010 relocated to a new 21,000 sq. ft. facility located in Daytona Beach, Florida, just a half a mile from the famous Daytona 500 speedway.

Contained in Sccy's new facility are numerous state of the art CNC machining centers of various types using custom tooling and programs designed by Joe Roebuck. The barrel, slide, receiver and all other major metal components are manufactured at the new facility. It was Joe Roebuck's vision that the CPX series firearms could be both cost effective and precisely manufactured to be as good as or even better than other name brand name products, without the high cost to the retail buyer. Sccy is now positioned to continue producing and developing new designs for the CPX series firearms. The CPX series envisioned has been successfully manufactured and sold throughout the United States using its own dealer network. Sccy's success is benchmarked by producing over 45,000 firearms to date. This success continues to grow with the current introduction of the new "Generation 2" CPX series. This year, 2011 Sccy will produce CPX-1 and CPX-2 "Generation 2" pistols and expand its national dealer base to a new all time high.

New customer service procedures are now in place to insure fast and personal service to both retail customers and dealers in need of warranty service. We wish to thank every customer and dealer for the trust and continued loyalty to the Sccy brand and products.


Warranty

    This gun is covered by Davidson's Lifetime Replacement Guarantee.       If it breaks, you get a new gun!!!
    SCCY Firearms carry a lifetime factory warranty also.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Hitachi C10FS 10-Inch Dual Slide Compound Miter Saw
postcontent:
Think of the Hitachi C10FS as the Clydesdale of all the industry's sliding compound miter saw workhorses. It's tough, well built, and feature packed. One of the few saws on the market that bevels to both sides, the Hitachi lets you make compound cuts to the right or left without the hassle of transferring marks or repositioning stock--and the 10 amp motor is situated above the arbor to allow a wider cutting range. Unlike other top-heavy saws, the Hitachi remains well balanced and easy to maneuver--which, along with its smooth-operating blade guard, makes it a relatively safe saw to use. The saw's table allows a good miter range, swinging 57 degrees right and 46 degrees left, and the unique bevel and miter scale makes cutting crown molding a snap whether you're an expert or a novice.
We especially like how Hitachi's multi-V-belt soft-start transfer delivers power smoothly. The saw doesn't jump or buck on start-up, so cuts are generally safe and easy to keep true. The saw cuts 3-1/2- to 12-inch stock at a 90-degree miter, and at 45 degrees the saw handles a 9-inch cut. We also like that the Hitachi features adjustable plastic fences that give support when cutting small pieces close to the blade, but are a bit disappointed that the saw lacks a detent override, a mechanism that disengages the preset table settings and makes it easier to lock into angles close to 0 and 45 degrees.

title: For Sale:  MINT Ruger Redhawk 44 Magnum 7.5" Stainless w/ Pachmayr Grips & Speedloader
postcontent:
*PLEASE NOTE: THIS GUN IS BEING SOLD FOR LOCAL PICKUP ONLY. IT IS UP TO YOU TO PICK GUN UP FROM ME IN CLARKSTON, MICHIGAN, BRING PROPER PURCHASE PERMIT, AND PAY CASH. NO SHIPPING* 

I am the original, and only, owner of this Ruger Redhawk .44 Magnum Revolver. This gun has been used exclusively for home protection. I have taken it to the indoor range 3 times and in this gun's life it has had less than 50 rounds shot through it. 

The overall condition is Very Good-Excellent. The gun is Stainless Steel and has a 7-1/2" barrel. The Walnut grips were removed right after the gun was purchased so that Pachmayr grips could be installed. You will be getting both sets of grips.
